original_text: And he took up his parable, and said, Balak the king of Moab hath brought me from Aram, out of the mountains of the east, saying, Come, curse me Jacob, and come, defy Israel.
korean_text: 발람이 예언을 전하여 말하되 발락이 나를 아람에서, 모압 왕이 동쪽 산에서 데려다가 이르기를 와서 나를 위하여 야곱을 저주하라, 와서 이스라엘을 꾸짖으라 하도다

sentences.original_text: And he took up his parable
Balak the king of Moab hath brought me from Aram
sentences.korean_translation: 모압 왕 발락이 나를 아람에서 데려왔으니

sentences.original_text: out of the mountains of the east
